Start: ^Will: "Mary, our baker put a pie on the Inn’s window sill, and someone stole it, and I don’t want to accuse anyone but I have a couple people in mind."
Choices: ^Lergon Jeffors: He loves our pies and always jokes about how he can smell them from his window across the street.

^Mr. Martin Martins: Walks by our pie cooling window on his daily walk, he also stole a fork from us once. He claimed that he just forgot it in his pocket when he left so that case is still wide open.
^Peter the Thief: His name is Peter the Thief, it just seems like good practice to consider the town thief in the case of something stolen.
Lergon: ^It was not Lergon and he is very offended you thought it was him.
Martin: ^It was not Mr. Martin and he is offended you thought it was him.
Peter: ^It was Peter the Thief, who would've thought.
